definitions: in a way that involves or affects both sides

examples.text: of the 199 dogs, 36 were unilaterally deaf and 15 were bilaterally deaf

shortDefinitions: in way that affects or involves both sides

definitions: in a way that involves two parties, especially countries

examples.text: they insist on negotiating bilaterally with the other claimant state

shortDefinitions: in way that involves two parties
